item.title: April 10, 2025
item.author: mathewrupp@gmail.com (Mathew Rupp)
item.description: Zephyr is a great RTOS, but it can be extremely difficult to start learning.

item.title: April 9, 2025
item.author: mathewrupp@gmail.com (Mathew Rupp)
item.description: Setting up automations to make publishing easier is important. Today I used chatgpt to help build some go programs that allow me to write quick blog posts from the terminal
